description: This file defines a custom Document class for Next.js, customizing the server-side rendered HTML structure, primarily used for legacy compatibility with document-level tags during prerender.

classes.name: MyDocument
classes.description: A custom Next.js Document class used to modify the server-rendered HTML structure.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Returns the JSX element defining the HTML structure for the document, including language attribute, head, and body with main content and scripts.
